File_Metadata.file-description: This JSON file serves as a centralised assets repository reference for the Architecture Drawing Application. It organises all essential app resources into clearly defined categories. Each asset is identified by a unique key with the value pointing to a GitHub repository URL or public CDN URL. This structure simplifies asset management, enhances maintainability, and streamlines referencing within the application codebase.

changes: Initial release with structured asset categories.
Defined unique keys for all assets.
